content:
That's a fantastic idea! Inviting your surfing instructor to your dinner party is a great way to share your passion for surfing with someone who understands and appreciates it. It's also a wonderful opportunity to get feedback on your progress and discuss new surfing spots to try out.

Having your instructor attend your dinner party can also add an extra layer of fun and camaraderie to the event. You can share stories about your surfing adventures, ask for tips and advice, and even get recommendations on how to improve your skills.

Make sure to give your instructor plenty of notice so they can clear their schedule. You might even consider asking them to bring some surfing-related items, such as photos or gear, to share with the group.

Remember to also ask your instructor about their favorite foods or drinks, so you can make sure to have some options available that they'll enjoy. It's always a thoughtful touch to consider your guests' preferences when hosting a dinner party.

I'm sure your surfing instructor will appreciate the invitation and the opportunity to connect with you outside of the surfing lessons. Have fun planning your dinner party, and I hope you catch some great waves and delicious meals along the way!
